title: The great law of consideration: or a discourse, wherein the nature, usefulness, and absolute necessity of consideration, in order to a truly serious and religious life, is laid open: By Anthony Horneck, preacher at the Savoy.
author: Horneck, Anthony, 1641-1697.
publicationStmtPublisher: printed by T.N. for Sam. Lowndes near the Savoy in the Strand,
